ResearchProjectDef.label: Shield Generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: This shield generator will stop incoming projectiles while allowing ones out providing the ultimate in static defenses. Also protects against artillery, hostile pod insertion, falling meteors, super-space laser orbital bombardments, etc. You name it, we stop it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Large Shield
ResearchProjectDef.description: This larger vartiety shield generator can sustain a larger field and more heat before collapsing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Portable Shield
ResearchProjectDef.description: A portable shield generator with small internal battery and nuclear-powered generator.
